subject: Football
Music
Television
Football (College)
Super Bowl
lead_paragraph: Perry, a pop superstar, will perform the halftime show at the Super Bowl, but she got her first taste of the sport with a memorable stint as a guest picker on ESPNs “College GameDay.”
